overview: Jennifer oversees the accounting, financial reporting and tax functions of CNF Investments, LLC. She joined CEI in 2004 in the corporate accounting group before transitioning full time into the private equity and venture group. Previously, Jennifer was at BenefitNation, Inc., a subsidiary of Bertelsmann AG where she was responsible for the financial reporting and daily operations. Jennifer began her career in the audit division of Arthur Andersen LLP, specializing in the banking and real estate industries. Jennifer is a CPA with a B.S. in both Accounting and Finance from the University of Maryland.
